name: getInvoices
description: Retrieves sales invoices or purchase bills

If-Modified-Since.description: Only records created or modified since this timestamp will be returned

IDs.description: Filter by a comma-separated list of InvoicesIDs.

InvoiceNumbers.description: Filter by a comma-separated list of InvoiceNumbers.

ContactIDs.description: Filter by a comma-separated list of ContactIDs.

Statuses.description: Filter by a comma-separated list Statuses. For faster response times we recommend using these explicit parameters instead of passing OR conditions into the Where filter.

page.description: e.g. page=1 – Up to 100 invoices will be returned in a single API call with line items shown for each invoice

includeArchived.description: e.g. includeArchived=true - Contacts with a status of ARCHIVED will be included in the response

createdByMyApp.description: When set to true you'll only retrieve Invoices created by your app

unitdp.description: e.g. unitdp=4 – (Unit Decimal Places) You can opt in to use four decimal places for unit amounts
